resources.string: Take the Guitar Quiz and email the results to whoever doubts your guitar skills!
This App is a deliverable for the Google Developer Challenge Scholarship 2018.
Toggle if you want your score to be emailed or shown here: Email = checked, Shown = unchecked
1. What chord is shown in this diagram?
2. Which type of chords sounds darker and sad?
3. What guitar accessory is shown in the picture above?
4. What chord is shown in this diagram?
5. Who was the original lead guitarist for Gun\'s and Roses?
